item.title: Live Unit Testing in Visual Studio 2017
item.description: I am a big proponent of unit testing my code because of the many benefits it provides: Helps me to catch potential bugs early Helps me to clarify the behavior of my units (classes) from a client perspective Leaves a documentation trail for those that come behind me to understand my intentions The only irritation/friction I have found in the past is the fact that running unit tests has required me to manually run them on a periodic basis.

item.title: About
item.description: Todd Meinershagen Summary Accomplished architect with over 20 years of in-depth, hands-on experience designing and developing service-oriented, n-tier applications to solve business problems. Certified in diverse areas. MCSD.NET Professional Scrum Master I Certificate in Java Development Advanced Distributed Systems Design M101JS - MongoDB for Node.JS Developers M102 - MongoDB for DBAs Teacher’s heart and enjoy collaborating with people. Dedicated to improving processes, learning new technologies/techniques, and generating ideas while striving for excellence in everything that I do.
